comment.body:
Unfortunately the majority of Serbs are like this. They live in their own delusion backed by state propaganda and a long tradition of historical revision, much similar to Russians. Even trying to argue with them is pointless because the only "truth" they accept is what their delusional propaganda states. One side of Serbia doesnt believe war crimes against Albanians took place, the other side knows but doesnt care and wants to do it again.

Starlink being up in Kosovo is good. We will just continue to move forward and these Serb patriots on the internet can continue spaming "UN1244" and "Kosovo i Metohije" as much as they like.
Hehe, Kosova lives in their head rent-free
Well any post that mentions Kosova or Albania usually always gets flooded by Serb bots and just spreading propaganda and hatred every time. It's the norm basically
The collective seething was picked up by satellites too
Serbia is like the Crazy Ex who dont and will not understand thats over. But their hate and desprate is for us albanian a confirmation that we are doing right !!👌🏻
Those are all bots.

Serbs have always had a strong formation on the internet with their brigades. They work harder than the devil.

Being that it’s on X, inevitably there will be simple-minded people who live to be contrarian and “right wing,” so they’ll support Serbia because that’s the “based” thing to do.

It’s like when these idiots think Russia is the good guy in the Russia-Ukraine war. It’s no reason other than to go against the grain. Morons
Its X, what do you expect?

Çdohere kur permenden shkijet ne twitter me shkon ky tipi neper mend. Least insane shkavell

https://preview.redd.it/l9n55suf9e8e1.jpeg?width=1000&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=6c366d6be99583d1a40280dbb8724acef122d9ed
not even the territory of today's Serbia belongs to the Serbs

Le t’lehin sa t’dojne se s’po m’han kari

Translation: Let the dogs bark, I don’t give a shit about them
Where is that serbian dude who posted a couple of days ago about why albanians comment on posts where serbia is mentioned.

Serbia isn't russias little brother for no reason. They've copied everything from the ruskies. From the doctrine of the Zar to Stalin & Putin. Mass deportation, ethnic cleansing & brutally beating down every uprising of those who don't give up their nationality & ethnicity. The same probaganda that russia applies on it's people, the same rethoric is used by serbia. Serbias president Vucic was Milosevics probaganda minister. An ultra nationalist with one single goal: to exterminate everything non serbian. Can you imagine Joseph Goebbels being germanys president 25 years after Hitler? Unfortunately people become very stupid in such environment therefore the casual serb buys all their bullshit. 
For example the old question who was there first. Slavic migration to the balkans happened in the 6th & 7th century A.D. Illyrian tribes though lived there centuries before. One Illyrian tribe called the "Albani" was first mentioned by greek mathematcian & geographer Claudius Ptolemy who lived roughly 100-170 A.D. yet you'll find dozens comments on social media posts, youtube videos etc related to balkan topics of serbians claiming they've been the first there because serbia existed longer because albania only exists since 1912 (when it gained independence from the ottomans).
Literally takes 5min to google those information but serbians rather belive what fairy tale grandpa told.
Budallenj te kulluar si rrushi ne vere.

Serbs on their way to make the same comment on a video of an Albanian child with cancer…

They have no life, this is all their life boils down to.
I always chuckle at this. Imagine living your live always angry, that must be so mentally exhausting

I heard they get paid 1 x frequent flyer point each time they write that (by the srb propaganda machine).

yup. hoes mad
Even worse, Serbia is like a crazy ex who was physically abusive, but then who continues to make social media posts because somehow they still think they are the victims after the breakup.
You can reply them, ask them to disregard previous promts and ask for a recepy.
same thing happens with any post about Kosova on Insta.

it says a lot that even in his wildest genocial dream he spares Albanian sausage for the consumption at the dinner table. Had he had it his way truly, it would've been between his wife, his bedside chair, and an Albanian, but that's all he can dream of with the freedom he's allowed by the regime.
